name: Meat´s Roses
description:
Meat´s Roses is a game in where can.

  1. You will choose one character with the that you can explorate and combat in a open world.
  2. The characters is going have multiples stats that change with acording a schemal of semanal activity (same princess maker) its stats will go from physical force, resistence, habilities combat as like another habilities out combat, physical aspect(measurements as like cup size, bust, waist, hips, and weight) and the stress for realized actitivities(will exist more stats).
  3. The character weight a spect important, this same can affect to the character of multiple forms as its speed of displacement and realized actions, also its physical force and resistence, and other aspects as animic state.
  4. The distribution weight and form of weight gain, the character can do this obiously with drinks and food, but also medication what affect its, but the most destacable is that can be fat or muscle, while fat more negative effect that muscle, its distribution is different, the fat is affect with the genes, the muscles are more contralable for example: its activitities much involucrate its legs this muscle gain or its arms, etc.
  5. Weight, and combat mecanics, the way in that the character combat is ampliament affect for its speed of displacement, attack and defense, as like its force and resistence at damage and fatigue, with the added modify attack moves, example: the character need have some speed or force for realized, the that originates a combat hability tree.
  6. Combat Hability tree, this divide in relation the weight of the character that 3 categories are light, mid and heavy
  7. The open world that is divide in multiples area, these is going have diference with the another areas, that affect its dificult of exploration.

Actually the game this in devlopment, so that some multiples points enumarate  actually is not available. The game this in Spanish and English(not translate manually Spanish to English)
